body: Sarith and Mostapha, I have another question. What is the difference between the first rpict when it gives the number of rays, % and time.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/C31AgRiB4u5MJOyDB38Rvn46-IxJgh68uUJQQi0s8qopWjE47kY4iDOlVuFWytl2Zh7i*McGUNus7bH5QT7p5Hf0ol734V4T/rpictexe2.PNG) When only 1 CPU is used and  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/C31AgRiB4u6tBPUa4Pf7-ZL5-GOauKd8l09ABDivINobZSXfszmEkqkzvWqvIe6zpiuEE2Opm4HQqFELrIsWh7cwLxwVQlhE/rpictexe3.PNG) That second step that does use multiple CPU. Is there a way of optimising the first part or that can only be done with one CPU? Thank you.
